item.title: Texas and Florida Lawmakers Unveil Revolutionary "Fry an Egg" Energy Conservation Plan
item.description: In a bold bipartisan move that has climate scientists shaking their heads and chickens nervously clucking, Texas and Florida lawmakers have unveiled their revolutionary energy conservation plan to combat the record-breaking heatwave: the “Great American Egg Frying Challenge.” “Y’all want to stay cool? Then stop using so much dang electricity!” bellowed Texas Governor Greg Abbott at a press conference held in the parking lot of a Buc-ee’s, where the asphalt was hot enough to actually fry an egg.
